---
title: Extensions
sidebar_position: 1
---

# Extensions

Extension modules providing additional functionality and integrations.

*Documentation for extension functions will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access extension functions
pxt.ext.functions.yolox.yolox(...)
pxt.ext.functions.whisperx.transcribe(...)
```

## Available Extensions

This module provides access to third-party and specialized integrations that extend Pixeltable's core functionality.
